title: Barcelona
description: BarcelonaAndrès FrancoMelissa Newton was engaged to a very loving, wonderful man. But before she plans to celebrate her new engagement, she has to file for divorce. She hasn’t seen her estranged Spanish husband in three years. But she knew, it was time to bury the past and look forward to the future. Her marriage to Andrès only lasted four months—just like their son. So when their baby died, so did their marriage. But was it really true? Does time really heal old wounds?
author: Pamela Ann
